kv20.5:5.3: Nanu aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vutto bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
kv20.5:5.8: Hañci aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vutto bhagavatā, seyyathidaṃ—
kv20.5:5.9: sammādiṭṭhi … pe … sammāsamādhi, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.5:9.1: Sammāvācā maggaṅgaṃ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:9.3: Sammādiṭṭhi maggaṅgaṃ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:9.6: sammāvācā maggaṅgaṃ, sā ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:9.14: sammāsamādhi maggaṅgaṃ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:10.3: sammāājīvo maggaṅgaṃ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:10.5: sammādiṭṭhi … pe … sammāsamādhi maggaṅgaṃ, so ca na maggoti?
kv20.5:13.4: “pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ ājīvo suparisuddho hoti;
kv20.5:13.5: evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti.
kv20.5:14.4: “yasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha na upalabbhati, dutiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, tatiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, catutthopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati.
kv20.5:14.5: Yasmiñca kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha upalabbhati, dutiyopi … pe …
kv20.5:14.10: Imasmiṃ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati.
kv20.5:14.11: Idheva, subhadda, samaṇo, idha dutiyo samaṇo, idha tatiyo samaṇo, idha catuttho samaṇo.
